3dspace.description: The three dimensional region describing this location

city.description: The city this location is, or is located within

country.description: The country this location is, or is located within

district.description: The state this location is, or is located within

gps.description: The GPS co-ordinates of this location.

map_url.description: The url to the map of the location. This can be a globally recognized map url or the one specified by the network policy.

polygon.description: The boundary polygon of this location

state.description: The state this location is, or is located within
